dct_title_s: Cape Colony reconnaissance series. Port Nolloth & O'Okiep
dct_description_sm: Topographical map indicating Port Nolloth & O'Okiep and other towns, villages, roads, railways, rivers, mountains, dunes and other features in the area of Port Nolloth & O'Okiep.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Map folds into an outer cover.
2 inset maps: Port Nolloth (scale 1 in. to 1 mile) -- Sketch of O'Okiep (scale 1 in. to 0.5 miles)
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
